explains: v. 使潮湿，弄湿；减弱，抑制

sentences.en: Nothing seems to dampen his perpetual enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 似乎没有什么能减弱他持久的热情。

sentences.en: She wasn't going to let anything dampen her spirits today.
sentences.cn: 她不想让任何事情来影响她今天的兴致。

sentences.en: None of the setbacks could dampen his enthusiasm for the project.
sentences.cn: 任何挫折都不能减弱他对这个项目的热情。
